paper.title: Operational research insights on risk, resilience & dynamics of financial & economic systems
paper.abstract: Our article offers insights on the role of operational research (OR) in understanding financial and economic systems' risks and dynamics. It presents the latest methods in OR to address risks and uncertainties in these systems, covering topics such as options pricing, portfolio optimization, banking resilience, and the analysis of financial and economic co-movements. The included studies utilize advanced analytical tools, like stochastic programming, decision analysis, and machine learning, to create robust models for complex systems. These contributions aim to be valuable for academics, practitioners, policymakers, and regulators in the field.

domain_result.justification: 论文摘要明确提到了'options pricing'（衍生品定价）、'portfolio optimization'（投资组合管理）以及'banking resilience'（金融风险管理）等具体应用场景，表明其核心技术确实应用于这些金融研究领域。
